Body:
I want to update an macro enabled excel row using the Click of the Flic IoT button. I have tried using Microsoft Flow and Zappier but unfortunately both of them does not support Macro Enabled excel Workbooks either using Onedrive for business or any other mode. Is there any other possible solution to achieve the same , kindly advice

Regards JK

1) figure out what can update a macro enabled excel row".  2) figure out what the button can activate.  3) find something that can help #2 trigger #1.  *If you can do it from code* and *run that code where it can communicate* then you can solve this.  If not
